title: Add a new public Create page for showcasing work, attracting clients, and ad placements

requirements.text: Add a new public page at route `/create` (CreatePage) that showcases the developer’s work and services, includes strong CTAs to contact/hire, and provides clearly labeled advertisement placement blocks suitable for monetization (without integrating any third-party ad networks/scripts). All user-facing text on this page must be in English.

quotes: A Create page to showcase my work, attract clients, and run advertisements for online income.

acceptanceCriteria: Navigating to `/create` renders a new Create page under the existing PublicLayout (navbar + footer).

The Create page includes: (1) a hero/intro section, (2) a “Featured Work” section that reuses existing projects data/cards or a subset of them, (3) a “Services”/“What I can do for you” section, (4) at least one primary CTA button linking to `/contact`, and (5) an “Advertisements” section containing responsive placeholder ad blocks (e.g., banner and square units) labeled as ad space.
No third-party ad scripts, SDKs, iframes, or network integrations are added; ad blocks are purely UI placeholders that could later be swapped with real ad code by a developer.
Page is responsive and matches the existing site visual theme and dark mode styling.

requirements.text: Add the Create page to the public navigation so users can easily discover it on desktop and mobile menus.

quotes: A Create page to showcase my work, attract clients, and run advertisements for online income.

acceptanceCriteria: PublicNavbar shows a new nav link labeled “Create” that routes to `/create` on both desktop and mobile menus.
The active-route styling works for `/create` the same way it does for other public links.

requirements.text: Update the route-aware SEO configuration to include `/create` with an appropriate title, description, and OG image entry, consistent with the existing SEO system.

quotes: A Create page to showcase my work, attract clients, and run advertisements for online income.

acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/seo/routeSeo.ts` includes a `/create` entry with an English title and description appropriate for a client-attraction/portfolio showcase page.
Visiting `/create` updates the document title and meta tags via the existing SeoHeadManager behavior (no changes required to SeoHeadManager beyond adding the route mapping).

requirements.text: Add the `/create` route to the static sitemap so search engines can discover it.

quotes: A Create page to showcase my work, attract clients, and run advertisements for online income.

acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/public/sitemap.xml` includes a `<url>` entry for `https://your-domain.com/create` with reasonable changefreq/priority values aligned with the existing sitemap style.
No admin routes are added to the sitemap.

constraints: Frontend must remain React + TypeScript + Tailwind + React Query + TanStack Router (as currently used).
Do not edit files under `frontend/src/components/ui` or other frontend immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Do not introduce third-party ad network integrations, external scripts, or SDK-based advertising; only add UI placeholders/sections.
Backend must remain single-actor Motoko; no backend changes are required for this request.
nonGoals: Implementing real advertisement network integrations (Google AdSense, affiliate widgets, etc.).
Adding a new admin management UI/back-end APIs for ad inventory or ad placement configuration (unless explicitly requested later).
Changing existing Home/About/Projects/Skills/Experience/Contact content beyond what’s necessary to add navigation and routing for the new page.
